title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Feb 19 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Feb 19 2022
description:
Trudeau invokes martial law to stop Canadian truckers. C&B sum up the enormity of the situation. B: "I'm talking to people up in Canada, tied into the political system up there. They're saying the truckers could bring down the Trudeau government. This could actually happen. It's big." C: "The left wing has become so drunk with their own power in relation to covid, now they're tossing aside bedrock principles that have protected freedom in democracies around the world." Is Putin pulling back from the brink in Ukraine? Buck reminds us that he and Clay have to go through much shoddy reporting to try to figure out what's accurate. Canadian psychologist and podcaster Jordan Peterson joins Clay and Buck to discuss the shocking developments in Canada. C&B talk to a caller from Canada on the trucker situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
